content: flaunt your style with this entertaining crochet scarf that s both gorgeous and easy to make stitched in bernat softee cotton you ll create your scarf by doing filet crochet double_crochet single_crochet and slip stitches filet crochet is nice and airy for warmer days so you may want to make a few in different colors to match all your outfits measuring 60 long you can wrap yourself in so many ways to achieve a variety of fashionable looks video tutorial by jonah s hands https //www youtube com/watch v=f77kihrd9ou yarns for model bernat® softee cotton™ 4 2 oz/120 g 254 yds/232 m pool green 69010 3 balls
